Negative Reviews: Kitchen needed a deep clean not just a wipe down. Sofa had no support left and was very uncomfortable. Oven tempreture and settings worn off so tricky to use. Hardly any cooking utensils provided. Pools were great, but they are dated and one hydro slide was out of order.
Positive Reviews: Location, outdoor space, good size rooms, close to thermal pools where 3 day family pass a great deal. Air con. Large flat area for the kids to play on. Free wifi. Beautiful sunsets. Friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: Sharing a two-bedroom unit with another booking, thin walls.
Positive Reviews: Location, staff, hot pools, space, room quality.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Fair price, lovely place, would stay again.
Negative Reviews: Bunk bed was very squeaky.
Positive Reviews: Friendly staff, nice spacious rooms. very quiet location.

Review Title: Hot pools and waterslide fun in
Negative Reviews: I sounds funny but I would have liked a better dish soap be provided, one that cuts grease better. It seems common throughout New Zealand to use weak dish soap, so all the dishes feel greasy. They could also use some kind of shelf in the shower, to put shampoo onto, vs the floor of the shower.
Positive Reviews: The room was large  and  comfortable with  a lovely private deck backing  onto a green space. The bathroom was well lit and  spacious. The bed super comfy. Everything was clean  and there  was lots of  storage  space. The proximity to the hot pools and  the discount for entry was great. The staff were awesome - friendly, helpful, attentive, welcoming.

Review Title: Great place for a peaceful retreat away from noisy cities
Negative Reviews: The unisex toilet n shower
Positive Reviews: The location, the friendly staffs, the cleanliness of the room/cabin, the facilities..
Room Type: Large Standard Cabin with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Overall it was a lovely stay, just a shame we couldn‚Äôt rest very well.
Negative Reviews:
The people who stayed in the room next to us were noisy all night and day. 
kept waking us up which we know isn‚Äôt the resorts fault. 
The mattresses must be old as they weren‚Äôt very comfortable. we sunk right through and could feel the metal bedbase.
Positive Reviews: location was amazing, staff were exceptional and friendly. the shared facilities were very clean.
Room Type: Basic Triple Room with Shared Bathroom

Negative Reviews: The beds could've been a little comfortable but overall, we didn't mind.  Also, we were unaware with the change of fresh towels.  It only stated that replacement towels will be provided when using the pool facilities which we never used throughout our stay.  I just find it rather disappointing when cleaners were servicing all the rooms onsite.  A better understanding or explanation would've been helpful.
Positive Reviews: The location was superb, especially the scenic view of the lake and mountains from the deck.  The studio was clean and tidy, and very spacious.  Staff were customer friendly.  An awesome place to relax and enjoy with family and friends.  Would definitely stay there again.

Negative Reviews:
Upon arrival it did not look clean and that could be because the facilities are quite old. I noticed a few cob webs in the corners of the room. 
I had to question the daily service with the staff as the info said one thing but what we received was different. Why advise beds will be made if they aren't? I did what was instructed. Why would you not provide towels for all guests? I also noticed no extra blankets were available in the rooms.
Positive Reviews: I liked how family friendly the facilities are and the location. It's not too far from town and eating places. I liked the size as it was big enough space for a family of five. The staff were also friendly.

Review Title: Will look forward to coming again and again if offered a more ‚Äòquiet and private‚Äô option!
Negative Reviews: The room was excellent but the privacy was not so great. Other cabins looked directly into #5 and closing curtains was the only option. The adjoining room was also VERY NOISY. We heard parents screaming at kids and kids jumping on beds and crashing around in their kitchen. That was a bit disappointing. Check aircon regularly‚Ä¶it smelt weird.
Positive Reviews: Loved the double glazing in the room - very cozy at night. Spacious. All we needed was provided for dining/ cooking gear, good supply of hot drink selection and towel service were superb. Cleanliness was good and I‚Äôm super fussy in that aspect. Loved the proximity to pools and spa, Hilton Hotel restaurant, other attractions and Taup≈ç township.

Negative Reviews: Everything else was quite nice, but the cabin we were staying in was probably also a family cabin, with a door separating the two rooms. As we were just 2 people, the other part of the cabin was rented to another group. The door separating the two spaces was locked, but there was no insulation of course which made it feel like there was no privacy. I was woken up during the night by someone in the other room snoring.
Positive Reviews: Staff was very vriendly, on-site parking, cute cabin, clean.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: pleasant enjoyable and comfortable will be back.
Negative Reviews:
I was allocated a car park which was taken by my neighbours the evening prior to my departure.  When I approached them to ask to move as we were leaving early and needed to load bags and bikes they were not please and grumbled.  Even checking on who owned the car was a mission which wasn't well received by anyone. 
It seems the parking policy needs to be communicated more clearly.  Which car park is for each room.  Always a difficult one.
Positive Reviews: Room was well presented and warm.  Very clean and good facilities. staff were very pleasant, friendly and helpful.
Room Type: Large Standard Cabin with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Clean and simple family friendly accommodation, with waterpark a bonus
Negative Reviews: Beds weren't super comfortable - there was a dip in the middle of the double which was awkward. Kitchen was billed as self contained but we had one pot without a lid and a frypan with a loose handle. No oven, just a microwave/convection hybrid with no instruction manual which limited us a lot. Lack of proper changeroom for women at the waterpark was a bummer too (cubicle with a curtain was not the most comfortable or secure). Consider adding flyscreens in any future renovations - would be nice to enjoy the breeze without letting in the bugs (and there were lots of those!)
Positive Reviews: The cabins were nice and tidy and quiet, didn't hear a peep from any other guests so felt nice and secluded. The water park was fun despite the renovations - the four year old had the time of her life! Living space was a good size for us. Close enough to town centre to explore everything. Staff were very friendly and it was nice having a discount at the waterpark because of all the work. Complementary milk was a nice touch too. Shower was nice, Hot and good pressure, and nice to have the airing rack for wet swimwear.

Negative Reviews: The kitchen items weren't super clean - lip marks on glasses and we rewashed everything we used. Lady at the spa reception the night we stayed was super rude - we got in before the cutoff (8pm) but she scolded us for being "very late" even though we were there before the last call and was generally very standoffish. Considering we paid $56 for 25 mins in the hot pool, she could've been a bit nicer.
Positive Reviews: Beds were comfy, chalet was spacious and warm. Bathroom had heated floor! The spa when we got in was nice, front desk crew was also lovely and helpful. Good-size TV and the wi-fi was super useful. A nice spot to break the driving in half coming back to AKL from Wellington :)

Review Title: Amazing place for a family getaway
Negative Reviews: More so feedback: We ordered takeout and needed more rubbish space (only a small bin in the family sized unit). Luckily we always carry rubbish bags when travelling so it wasn't left out before we departed.
Positive Reviews: The welcome I was met with at Reception was awesome! The lady that checked us in was so friendly, chatty and helpful. The accommodation was a perfect size for our family and the spa was amazing for the whole family.

Negative Reviews:
I was inadvertently given a key for the wrong room. I did realise some hours later when I noticed the bedding configuration was different to what I'd booked. Luckily, this was just before the other guests had checked into the room as it would have been awkward if they'd come in when I was in the room, or worse if I'd been out if when they arrived to find all of my personal items in the space! The other negative is that the conjoined rooms are very noisy - I could hear EVERYTHING from the adjacent guests (talking, arguing, hocking, thumping about and the child jumping off the bunk). 

Also, the pool area could do with some a refresh - some deep cleaning/maintenance/refurbishment as there were areas where the paint was coming off, lots of weeds etc. One of the waterslides was closed off. The private pools are somewhat creepy and not at all what I expected. They're dark and dingy, and all I could hear was conversations from the family next to me so I didn't spend long in there at all.
Positive Reviews:
I had a great stay at Debretts. All of the staff across the facility were amazing. Welcoming, friendly and nothing was too much trouble. My visit included accommodation plus use of the pool and a spa treatment, it was all very nice. I used the pools, visited the spa in the morning when it was quieter, then my room was ready so I checked in. After exploring the town and having a meal I came back to the pools again in the evening. 

I booked one of the cheaper rooms with shared facilities, as it was just a short 1-night stay so I didn't mind not having a private bathroom too much. I can't comment much on the shared kitchen/lounge as I didn't use but the bathrooms were fine.  

Looks like a great all-round venue with a variety of accomm options for all types of travellers including campervans.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Negative Reviews: The noise from adjoining cabin was very audible. The lighting was awful - bright and harsh. The bedcovers felt very synthetic and therefore not fresh. The spa was a bit shabby.
Positive Reviews: Common facilities were spacious and clean.The room was a good size and the bed was comfortable. The spa was good value and relaxing. The staff were all lovely.
Room Type: Large Standard Cabin with Shared Bathroom

Negative Reviews: Bathroom was surprisingly unclean, considering the condition of the rest of the chalet was really pretty good. Scum around the tap was easily wiped with toilet paper - obvious it had not been cleaned between guests. The hair dryer did not work either which was disappointing.  A chopping board in the kitchenette would be a great addition.
Positive Reviews: Loved the space of the chalet. Lots of room, and enough space to not be right on top of each other.  Perfect for our family.  Beds warm and cosy.  The staff were so friendly and helpful.  Pools were awesome, even though on the last morning one of the main pools only had about 1/2 a foot of water in...kids still splashed around.  Parking was nice and easy, and a short walk for getting to the pools (a really cool walk at night with all the lights!)

Negative Reviews:
It's essentially a standard holiday park near a Geothermal pool/spa (not included with your stay). If I were to visit Taupo again I'd book somewhere else and visit for the day.

The room smelled a little sweaty/moldy
Positive Reviews:
The pool facilities are great. Reception was helpful and friendly. Landscaping and surroundings kept really clean and tidy. Although we didn't camp the camp facilities looked nice, I think I would have enjoyed camping more.

The room was well equipped with large fridge freezer, 2 a/c units, oven, microwave, dishwasher, soaps, towels, hairdryer, iron.... Everything you need.

Negative Reviews: Beds were uncomfortable.
Positive Reviews: Overall we really enjoyed our stay. We had a smooth & friendly interaction at the reception.The kitchen facilities were awesome at our room. We really enjoyed the spas.

Negative Reviews: Unfortunately we stayed in a room which had a shared door to another room, we could hear the other family's TV, coughing and snoring as though they were in the same room. The blind above the double bed didn't go down fully.
Positive Reviews: Comfy beds, great clean bathroom facilities, friendly and helpful staff. I loved waking up to cute tiny ducklins outside my door. Everything we needed.
Room Type: Large Standard Cabin with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Good for what you pay for but comfort is lacking
Negative Reviews: The rooms need updated. The size of the rooms weren‚Äôt great and the beds were very uncomfortable.
Positive Reviews: Staff were very friendly and helpful. Facilities were clean and close by the accommodation
Room Type: Basic Triple Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Amazing, lots of things to do and great for the kids!!
Negative Reviews: I wonder what the construction work was for the hot pools. I'll be back to see the finish product. The room gets quite messy and sometimes I don't like to leave it for the cleaners. Is there a broom or vaccum in the rooms? Not sure if the geothermal heaters were working but it wasn't too cold so didn't need to use it but be nice to have some instructions on how to use it?
Positive Reviews: The service from the receptionist was really friendly and helpful. The beds were comfy and the room was very large. I liked that there was designated parking and facilities were all close by. Lots of things for the children to do... Absolutely loved soaking into the hot pools. Kids had a blast. Also didn't get to utilise all the facilities so will need to come back.

Negative Reviews: Challenging and tight carpark for our unit vs the size of our vehicle which is only a 7 seater. Not very clean. Very basic for the amount of money paid. Hot pools not included although discounted but still have to pay even for a spectator (lol).
Positive Reviews:
Bed was comfortable.
Nice big fridge and cooking facilities availability. Friendly staff.

Negative Reviews:
Pool area definitely wasn't what it looked like on the photos. 
We stayed in a  2bd chalet which was only separated by a door, it was quite easy to hear the people in the next room.
Beds and pillows are also very uncomfortable.
Positive Reviews:
Rooms were nice and spacious.
Reception girls were very nice and friendly.
Jumping pillow was good for the kids

Negative Reviews: A lamp would be a nice touch to the rooms.
Positive Reviews: Nice big room. The shared bathroom was clean and also big enough space for my partner and I to share a shower cubicle. Was a very good price point for a one night stay. Lots to do for the kids and everybody is friendly. Pool discount was a bonus.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Great value, awesome place to stay
Negative Reviews: Bunk beds not that comfortable
Positive Reviews: Clean, loved the pools, great facilities, friendly staff

Review Title: A lovely family place to stay
Negative Reviews: The room was showing a little wear and tear. The bunks could do with a bit of a re-screw, because they are pretty squeaky.
Positive Reviews: The room had everything that we needed and was clean and spacious. It was nice and private and had a relaxed feel. The staff were friendly and helpful.

Negative Reviews: Having to walk to the bathrooms and having a long walk up and down to the heating pool area. Otherwise all was well.
Positive Reviews: Ground were lovely, spa and treatments were great and was nice to have on-site.  Staff were friendly. Room had heat pump which was a great feature and added alot of comfort.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Good value for money, friendly staff, excellent place to stay and spend time with family
Negative Reviews:
Fridge was a bit dirty inside and dusty on the top. 
Bed sheet had stains on.
Positive Reviews:
Comfortable beds 
Cooking facilities in the villa 
Family friendly 
Thermal pools

Review Title: Glistening waters only moments away in Taupo.
Negative Reviews: Rooms lacked a little personality, would loved to have seen photos of the local surrounds.  And more comfortable lounge furniture after a long drive.  Rooms held function over comfort.
Positive Reviews: Superb location for a visit to the hot pools with spacious rooms for families.

Review Title: Relaxing family holiday facility with everything you need although internet could be more stable.
Negative Reviews: See above - beds and wifi.
Positive Reviews: Great cabin, generous size with very good facilities and deck with view. Beds a bit too soft but still relatively comfortable. Free wifi but intermittent connection.

Negative Reviews:
Would have been good to have a pool available on site for guests and not have to pay extra to visit the Spa Resort. This would be good for a quick dip rather than visiting a public pool/spa resort and making a day/few hours of it. That said, the mineral pools are worth a visit.

The crockery, glasses and cutlery etc were a little dirty and needed a quick wash before use. Likely dishwasher not cleaning that well...
Positive Reviews: Room was large and spacious. Nice to have a good sized kitchen area and lounge. Love having a washing machine in the room. View of the mountains and slight view of the lake from our room and from the main bedroom was amazing! Easy access to Debretts Spa Resort,though take note there is an extra fee for the pools. Discount available for guests. The pools are a highlight!

Negative Reviews: Our room cleaning standards were not great. The entrance to the spa was not included despite of this being the main value point of this hotel.
Positive Reviews: The proximity to the hot springs and the town. The room was spacious and the beds were comfortable.

Review Title: Overall a nice stay, great spacious accommodation with lake and mountain views.
Negative Reviews: Lounge suite was too small for a family sized villa, only a 2.5 seater - an L shaped corner suite would be more appropriate. Cleaning could have been a bit better. A better selection of channels on Sky to watch sports would have been a bonus.
Positive Reviews: Great views from the Lakeside Villa, king sized bed was comfy and the accommodation was spacious. Underfloor heating on the tiles was an added bonus for the cold evenings and mornings.

Review Title: Warm campground Chalet with Mt. Ruapehu view
Negative Reviews: Bathroom needs an overhaul, felt more like campground facilities, no storage, black mouldy edges everywhere, window handles and towel rails loose/broken. We were expecting some noise from the pools, but it was too loud for us.
Positive Reviews: Good heating in the living area and main bedroom, good storage in the bedrooms, parking in front of the Chalet, nice view to Mt. Ruapehu. Lots of towels provided.

Review Title: Overall, a great place to stay with lots to do for the kids, and close to the town centre.
Negative Reviews: Unit had an issue with ants even though we kept the food area clean, and watered down dishwasher liquid that didn‚Äôt clean the dishes properly.
Positive Reviews: Great location, great facilities, comfy beds, good discount for water park, friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: The dinnerware such as the cups and plates and such still had residue from, I'm assuming, the previous guests that stayed so it was unpleasant to have to check each item before using it. The bodywash/shampoo provided, though it states that it's 'an approved bodywash', is hand soap coming out of a soap dispenser like the ones you see in public bathrooms.
Positive Reviews: We had a spacious room (it was more like a mini apartment) that came with a small kitchen and living area, and the location of the resort itself was away from all the hustle and bustle. There was also a VERY friendly duck that came to our door at the same time on both days of our stay - not sure if a trained resort duck or not but either way, it was adorable.

Review Title: I would certainly come back again! Thank You.
Negative Reviews: I wasn't expecting a single bunk bed / a single bed.
Positive Reviews: The location is good and the shared facilities were very clean.
Room Type: Basic Triple Room with Shared Bathroom

Review Title: Over all good stay-nice clean chalet & lovely location but missed little touches to finish it off.
Negative Reviews: No hotel booklet to tell you about the property (tv channels, about servicing the apartment, checking out & all hotel info etc.) - there is a tv channel to watch but it is quite long & not informative . Would have been awesome to have little shampoo, conditioner, creams & soaps etc. that come with the room. Also, rooms with washing machines should come with a small washing powder sachet - instead of having to go over to reception. Extra blankets in the cupboard would be nice too :)
Positive Reviews: Size, location & cleanliness  of the Chalet was awesome. Kitchen facilities good & beds were comfy.

Review Title: Good 1 night stay to break up a longer trip.
Negative Reviews: Value for money was not good in my opinion.  The 4 bed cabin we stayed in was fine for one night, maybe two at a pinch. Just too cramped for a family of four.
Positive Reviews: Close to hot pools and central Taupo. cabin was clean and tidy with a good shower. Great facilities, playgrounds etc.

Negative Reviews: The beds were very soft and uncomfortable. There was no air-conditioning or fans in the bedroom so it did get stuffy at night.
Positive Reviews:
Omg the pools and slides were the best. Paid $43 extra for the pools for 1 day out of which we spent 2 hours in the pool. They shouldn't be charging extra but at the end of the day we all enjoyed.
The room was clean and spacious with free private parking just in front of the room. 
Very nice location.

Negative Reviews: The double bed was just two singles pushed together with a big sheet on it. This is a pet hate of mine as it means there is a large ridge in the middle of the bed. It would be great if accommodation providers would state this is the case rather than calling it a double or a king etc.
Positive Reviews: Clean room. Decent amount of space. Proximity to the pools obviously the main draw card.

Negative Reviews: Room felt a bit muggy and humid when we first entered but this cleared out after we left the windows and door opens for a bit.
Positive Reviews: Room size, view, amenities and the kitchen facility in our villa was a feat.

Negative Reviews: The freezer was a bit dirty and the cabin a bit dusty, but nothing a cleaning cloth could not fix.
Positive Reviews: The villa was spacious, the underfloor heating in the bathroom was nice. Black out blinds were a good bonus. The view was stunning. The pools nice and hot.

Negative Reviews: The bedding was a little bit unclean. We found a lot of hair in our sheets.
Positive Reviews: The location was nice, the hot pools were really good as well. The room size was great and the parking too.

Negative Reviews: The room could've been a little more clean, there were sticky parts on the floor by the bin and there was dust in the corners.  A good vacuum and a wipe of the skirting boards would do wonders. It's unfortunate that the pools are so expensive even when staying.
Positive Reviews: The room was perfect for our family. The size, bed formation, location, kitchen facilities.  It was lovely and warm especially with the underfloor heating.

Review Title: would have been great if it was clean and comfortable
Negative Reviews:
had to clean the shower before I used, hair on walls
coffee plunger still had coffee in from previous guest. dead bugs on light switch.
bed was terrible, like sleeping on wire
Positive Reviews: great location, beautiful outlook, great room facilities

Negative Reviews: There wasn‚Äôt a portable heater available for a bedroom so couldn‚Äôt close the doors. Had a 2year old who sleeps with his door closed but couldn‚Äôt close it as the room was freezing.
Positive Reviews: Clean, spacious, great view

Negative Reviews: me and my partner found our mattress really hard so didnt sleep too well. However the single beds were apparently comfortable according to our friends we stayed with. there is also a bit of a walk up a hill from the pool to the carpark.
Positive Reviews: pool area was so good, so many different things on offer and although there is an extra fee to get in it does include a 45 min session in the private pools which was great :) room was very spacious and we had a fantastic view of the water.

Negative Reviews: Bedding is outdated
Positive Reviews: Parking, room size, location

Review Title: acceptable accomodation for a lower rate, not the standard I was expecting.
Negative Reviews:
The accommodation was not the standard I expected from the website. 
There was a strange smell in the room.
The heat pump did not work well, so the room remained cold throughout our stay. 
The pillows were flimsy. 
Windows were pouring with condensation, adding to the  feeling of coldness and perhaps the smell was from the dampness. 
I wouldn't stay here again unless I was bringing my own accomodation for the campsite!
Positive Reviews: The beds were comfortable, the location was good, and the pools were a nice facility to have onsite.

Negative Reviews: 2 single beds pushed together, fridge noise
Positive Reviews: Staff efficient and Friendly, Heat pump, room size, Easy to access as stop over from main road, Proximity to Hot pools

Negative Reviews: Minor things, but shower head was broken which made showering tricky. The main ranch slider window frames were moldy, an easy miss for cleaners though, we only noticed because we have a toddler down low.
Positive Reviews: Good location. Pools are great to have on site. Lovely staff. The view of the lake was lovely from the deck. Very comfy beds. Would definitely stay again!

Negative Reviews: Was not very clean, we stayed for two days and the rubbish wasn‚Äôt taken away. Couch was grubby. Would not stay again. Felt very outdated for what you pay.
Positive Reviews: The room was a good size and was very warm. Staff were nice and friendly. Great location.

Negative Reviews: A bit nit picky but the wash benches in the bathrooms are low. But other then that everything was awesome.
Positive Reviews:
Location, activities. Such a family friendly location but also there was something for mum and dad aswell.
Accomodation was clean, comfortable and warm. Perfect for what we needed. Staff were amazing and let us finalize things ahead of check in, rooms were serviced on demand.

Negative Reviews: The main bed was just fine, but the bunk bed was quite uncomfortable
Positive Reviews: Tidy room, quiet location, nice pools and friendly staff

Review Title: We are aware it‚Äôs a camp ground type facility, but some small
Negative Reviews:
There were no utensils to use the pots and pans to cook anything with.
Our bathroom was a bit grubby - dirty dishes, and stoned sheets, and the room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned well - there was lots of glitter and decorations from previous guests. 
Also surprised there was no shower curtain.
Positive Reviews:
Loved the location, and the under floor heating! 
Comfy beds. Staff were super friendly and helpful.

Review Title: We absolutely loved our stay at DeBretts and Taupo is amazing. Will definitely go again.
Negative Reviews: Shower was clean but not the outlet - yuk! And the microwave smelt of pizza. ü•∫ A one off I hope! The aircon remote batteries were flat and it was cold one night. Couldn‚Äôt find another blanket.
Positive Reviews:
The view from our room was beautiful. Lovely for sundowners on the deck. Sunset was amazing.  The pool was awesome. Rooms were very clean. Kitchen too. 
Underfloor BC heating in the morning was awesome. 
Staff were very friendly,  helpful obliging.

Review Title: Ordinary. Not like photos, wont be returning.
Negative Reviews: The accommodation wasnt clean, we could hear the occupants in the adjacent unit, there was no soap in bathroom but lots of soap scum, the bed was on a lean and very uncomfortable and pillows awful.
Positive Reviews: When we arrived at our room it was dirty and the shower leaked into the kitchen. The staff moved us to another room. This room had a nicer view and was larger.

Review Title: Enjoyable but too far apart from family.
Negative Reviews: As above. Would‚Äôve liked to have been closer. Had 3 rooms, 2 were close but the 3rd was quite a distance away. The walk to the hot pools was a struggle (up hill). Also too many people in the pools. Having to be under 90 kegs for slides didn‚Äôt work for most of my family who are over 100kgs.
Positive Reviews: I liked the location and close proximity to other rooms family members potentially could‚Äôve had. On this occasion we weren‚Äôt together but next time we will try to be. Staff were great.

Negative Reviews: Cleanliness requires alittle more attention.
Positive Reviews: City central, the milk size was awesome and the towels were fluffy. Sharp knife, tidy room and good customer service. The discount for the pools.

Negative Reviews:
when we arrived there was a massive stain on the carpet which we presumed was permanent however after the room was serviced one day it was gone - so obviously the room hadn't been cleaned properly prior to our arrival

Both days clean towels were dropped off the door was not locked properly.
Positive Reviews:
Loved having hot pools and massages on site.
3 Bedroom chalet with plenty of sleeping options and very private
Easy check in
Plenty of parking
Friendly office staff

Negative Reviews:
Access to the spa/pool area quite steep so  didn't use as husband has mobility issues. Also spa and pool open to all including a school trip! 
We stayed in a superior studio which was not as expected, it was a stripped out caravan with a Bathroom.  It was also unclean, reported to staff, the kitchen especially needed a good clean including the fridge, cupboard door handles and window cills. Bathroom was not as clean as it could have been, top of soap dispenser and tissue holder had not been wiped over in ages. They were covered in  dust.
Positive Reviews:
Proximity to Lake and views. Taupo is a lovely area to explore and this was a great base. The views of the lake and snow capped mountains were amazing.  
Whilst the accommodation was not as expected it was a great size, especially for a couple,  and good facilities including a washing machine.  The site also looked like it had a good set up if camping or using a touring caravan or campervan.

Negative Reviews: Blood stain on bedding. Young female staff member who checked us obviously didn't want to be at work. 0 enthusiasm. Very monotone. No smile. Steps leading up to deck felt a bit flimsy.. extra towels in the room would be nice.
Positive Reviews: Cabin was great size and had a good view, nice and warm. Pools were great, location of entire place close to town. Majority of staff friendly and welcoming. Great that you can hire towels and kids can use floatys. 3day pass made pools more worth it. Kids loved the ducks, playground and bouncy pad thing.

Negative Reviews: The only issues we had was no vacuum or broom in the room and with 3 kids it was an issue keeping the eating area clean. Staff did vacuum for us when they serviced the room, which was most appreciated. The metal edge strip from the carpet to the tiles in the kitchen sticks up quite a bit. If stepped on directly, it is quite painful and 2 of my kids tripped on it. An angled edge trim or mat would rectify this.
Positive Reviews: Great location, 5 minutes drive to town center and Drop zone indoor playground. Hotpools were amazing, staff were lovely and helpful. Room was clean, comfortable and we enjoyed our stay very much.

Negative Reviews: Staff we're accommodating,and that's about it,distance was a problem from room to pools,slide was out of order ,lighting is an issue around the water park at night.
Positive Reviews: Facilities,staff we're accommodating. Beds and pillows were super comfortable. Pools were nice

Negative Reviews: The room tv wasn't working. I informed staff who were at my door shortly after trying to figure it out..they couldn't so brought me back some chocolates and wine and free entry for my family into the pools the following day. YAY!
Positive Reviews: We arrived late- when I went to collect the room key the receptionist was very friendly and polite, she informed me she had turned on the heat pump earlier knowing I was bringing my children. So helpful. Staff were great. Facilities were alright but for last minute accommodation it was great. My kids really enjoyed their stay. I'll be booking in again but in a different room, can't wait.

Review Title: The ideal weekend away with the hot pools right next door. Highly recommend the cabins. Cleaning could use a little of w
Negative Reviews: Unfortunately, the first thing we noticed when we walked into our lovely cabin was that the floor hadn‚Äôt been vacuumed. We then quickly noticed that the coffee table, fridge and microwave were dirty and there were bugs all over the bathroom ceiling and floor. I think a clean room should be expected at the very least. There was no improvement when we had ‚Äúservice requested‚Äù on our door the next morning. For your reference we stayed in unit 22.
Positive Reviews: We stayed in the superior double room cabin & we loved it! Quiet, cozy, spacious, had our own car park and the hot pools right next door. Ladies at front desk were awesome, friendly and very efficient. Will definitely be back!

Review Title: Campground with ammenities, not a resort
Negative Reviews: Room didn't have a shower mat which meant water got on bathroom floor and was causing wear and tear.  The shower had a sticker that was half pealed off and mouldy.  Strange that it wasn't just removed.  With small attention to detail the room could be greatly improved.  Staff were a little rude when I checked out.  Lacking basic customer service skills.  The property is not a resort - more a camp ground, and if you go with those expectations I'm sure it would be fine.
Positive Reviews: Good shower pressure.  Room had all the basic ammenities for a self contained unit.  Room mostly clean and tidy.  Convenient parking next to unit.

Review Title: Heading to the snow - Mum & 4 Children

Review Title: Value for money if one is on a budget, great location, hot pools just down the hill.
Negative Reviews:
Room was a bit poky but considering it was a cheaper option I shouldn't really complain.
Having to go else where to source water for the kettle was different.
The walls were a little thin, having a family next door one of the nights was a little noisy.
Positive Reviews:
My room was tidy, shared area appeared clean and tidy looked fairly new.
Lots of people staying there while I was there, placed seemed to be able to cope without any issues.
I had a great location that meant I didn't have to fall over anyone to get where I needed to go.
Room Type: Basic Double Room with Shared Bathroom

Negative Reviews:
We received a guest discount for use of the swimming area, however upon arrival we were informed that there was construction work ongoing and half the pools were closed. Guests not staying in the hotel were offered a discount to recognise this, however as guests of the hotel, we were told that as we already had been provided with a normal guest discount, we would be given no further discount to recognise the construction works. This felt completely unfair. Upon entering the pool area, we found it to be disgusting. Stains, dirt and moss everywhere. There was a dirty wet carpet between the natural pool and another pool that appeared mouldy and had moss growing on it. Honestly one of the worst spa pools we have ever been to - it was foul and in serious need of an upgrade. We felt ripped off completely. 

The cabin we stayed in was very basic, mostly clean but very tired and dated. Sound proofing was an issue and we could hear our neighbours clearly. 

Overall, I would say best to avoid if you can.
Positive Reviews: Good location. Clean sheets.

Negative Reviews: Rooms could have done with  a few more coat type hooks around to hang jackets on. And more hooks in the bathrooms for extra towels. Other than that it was fabulous

Review Title: A lovely break in a great spot with great pools!

The facilities of the pools are good however you need to remember to take a piece of paper if you book the pass for the few days and you still have to queue even though you have paid. A wrist band system would be good!

The living area in the cabin was probably too small for the 5 of us and with only a small sofa and 2 tub chairs, a couple ended up sitting on the floor. Could also do with some storage in the 2nd bedroom!
Positive Reviews: The cabin was nice and clean with a fabulous shower in a great location overlooking Lake Taupo. Review Title: Not really an ideal place to stay with younger kids.
Negative Reviews:
The lighting outside shining into the room was horrible. It was a constant bluish, green light lighting up the whole apartment all night. The curtains did nothing to keep the light out. Not good if you have children or if you like to sleep in the dark... That alone puts me off staying there again.

The heat pumps heat only reached the rooms if you kept the bedroom doors open and had it turned up to the max. Again not ideal for families who need children to go to sleep before the adults and also not ideal privacy. Also the room closest to the heat pump got really hot if you wanted to heat the far room. 

The whole bathroom floor flooding everytime you have a shower as its not a closed in shower. You can't go toilet without wet feet. Children's pants get wet when they want to go toilet. Nothing to wipe excess water away. 

Many kitchen power points didnt work. They had an electric frying pan with no spatula.

The size of the apartment was good
Nice location to the pool

Review Title: Stunning resort, great facilities for kids and clean, tidy rooms.
Negative Reviews: Original booking was for 2 nights, then i booked an extra night for the day before and was made aware that they couldnt guarantee the same room. That was fine. We checked out of 1 room by 10am after the first night and asked if it was possible to check in earlier to the next room seeing as we were already there. They said they would try, and they would text me when the room was ready for us. No text - and at 14.10pm (check in was at 14.00) I went to reception to ask if the room was ready, only to be told 'Yes, its been ready for a while'. Pretty annoying when we were waiting around most of the day with young kids. Staff were friendly, but I felt like they could have better accommodated us in that situation.

Negative Reviews: Dirty coffee cups in cupboard on arrival. We stayed 3 nights and asked for room to be serviced after the second night (by indicating on the slide outside our door)... This didn't happen.

Review Title: A relaxing stay with excellent amenities, tempered by unexpected issues and fees.
Negative Reviews: However, this visit had a few setbacks. Shortly after checking in, we found a cockroach in my children's room, which was quite unsettling. Additionally, we were surprised by a $150 surcharge for having seven people in our party, a fee that was not communicated beforehand. Although we had requested two rollaway beds, they were not provided. Instead, we discovered the sofa could be pulled out into a queen-sized bed, which was not mentioned at booking. The staff had confirmed the availability of two rollaway beds and a cot for my infant, but upon arrival, only the portacot was provided. Additionally, the main hot pools were under renovation. While the majority of the other hot pools were available, this was not mentioned during the booking process.
Positive Reviews: I've stayed at Taup≈ç Debretts Spa Resort before and it consistently impresses. The WiFi is available and stable across the property, which is a huge plus. The rooms are designed like individual villas, providing the comfort and space of a whole house. Additionally, we received a 50% discount on the Hotpools as guests, which was fantastic. I also appreciate the heated floors, which keep the room cozy and warm during cold weather. Highly recommend!

Review Title: Staff were discrimatory and I didn‚Äôt feel safe staying there. Certainly NOT LGBTQI friendly!
Negative Reviews:
I felt discriminated on both my gender and sexual orientation. On arrival with my husband (same sex) I was asked ‚ÄúDid I know I booked a king bed‚Äù. On answering yes, the staff continued ‚Äúyou know you can‚Äôt split the bed in two‚Äù. On answering yes, another staff member interjected and said ‚Äúwe have to ask, cause some people get upset‚Äù. I am
sure straight couples aren‚Äôt subjected to
the same questions. This is the first time I have felt active discrimination in NZ and in Australia this sort of thing happened at least 15 years ago. Certainly didn‚Äôt feel safe at this property!

Review Title: Didn‚Äôt live up to my expectations when I booked.
Negative Reviews:
Cons: 
- The large master bedroom window blinds opened directly to expose you to your neighbors (aka no privacy!)
- Small outdoor seating area (2-3 people max)
- Top bunk bed ladder did not give a lot of confidence for a teenager utilizing it (or the bed itself)
- Bedding for five, but dining seating only for four. We had to bring a chair from outside in and then cozy around the table
- Hadn‚Äôt realized it would cost us $14pp each day just to use the pool
- Given an ‚Äòaccessible‚Äô room (certainly didn‚Äôt request nor need it) - there was no counter space in bathroom. I‚Äôm sure others that do need an accessible room would appreciate somewhere to leave their toiletries too.
Positive Reviews:
Pros: 
As it was a stand alone unit, you could drive up to & park next to your place.
Heating in the main room was fantastic.
Kitchen amenities were good.
TV & internet worked.

Negative Reviews: We moved one of the beds to get something out from under it that we‚Äôd dropped and it was quite dirty under the beds, older facilities
Positive Reviews: big room, close enough to amenities, quiet spot

Negative Reviews: Not alot of cleaning facilites available in room for cleaning up spills or broom etc. Nor washing facilities in the 1 bedroom unit. It would be nice to have a small washer and dryer. But over all it is great for a short stay.

Negative Reviews: Rooms were soo overpriced for what we actually got. Booked 4 rooms 1 out of the 4 got towels replaced despite going to the reception and asking if rooms could have clean towels and bedding. Went back towels not replaced dirty towels still left and bed made without changing sheets. Milk is given, almost forgot when u check in when they should be in rooms already. The next day you don‚Äôt get topped up another milk but coffee and sugar sachets are replaced only (not the hot choc for the kids :/ ) These small things add up and was just irritating :/ receptionist also gave wrong information or didn‚Äôt explain herself properly l, asked about the MƒÅori rock carving and she tells me ‚Äúit‚Äôs an hour drive out and an hour drive back from there‚Äù that put us off going as wasn‚Äôt keen for that ‚Äúdrive out‚Äù turns out she meant the boat ride out to get to the rock takes an hour and another hour to get back‚Ä¶so annoying. The paperwork that had been printed out and ready for us at reception were pretty much all wrong..the lady there explained it‚Äôs fine just list the people staying in each room‚Ä¶when given the keys to the rooms it was so confusing the lady didn‚Äôt really know which room had how many beds so it was like a guessing game, again so annoying
Positive Reviews: The two cleaner girls were really nice. when asked nicely if they could replace bedding and towels they did so and responded nicely.

Negative Reviews: Shower pressure was a bit low and the person next to us took our parking spot.
Positive Reviews: The bed was comfy and the rooms really warm.

Shower was open to the whole bathroom, would have been nice to have a shower curtain.

Review Title: Did not stay, checked out about 1.5hrs after arriving.
Negative Reviews:
Cabin carpet not vacuumed, fridge dirty, bedding stained and bedspread unwashed, hairs on sheets. Guest towels on beds very damp.
Pools and surrounding area looked rundown.
Positive Reviews: The bathrooms were clean.

Review Title: Had a great stay here and would book again
Negative Reviews: The surfaces in the room weren‚Äôt very clean but I just wiped them down with baby wipes so no major issue
Positive Reviews:
Family of 5, 2 teens and a toddler. Stayed in a 2 bdrm chalet, great spacious accomodation with fully equipped kitchen. 
Room was easy walking distance to the waterpark. (pools were really hot so it was good to be on site and easily go in the evening)
kids loved the jumping pillow.
Reception area had a good wee cafe and also snacks / drinks available.

Negative Reviews: The vanity in the bathroom was blocked! Once the tap was on, the vanity filled up. Was actually disgusting. For a resort, there wasn't even a shampoo or conditioner to use especially when u swim in chlorine. Most places I've b3en, there was always a shampoo and conditioner in the room which makes it convenient not to carry one in your luggage. For $245 a night, you'd expect more from the facility considering it's a "resort" not a motel!
Positive Reviews: Location was perfect and room was clean. Lots of privacy. Hot pools was a bonus üôÇ

Negative Reviews:
The cleanliness of the kitchen frankly was a shock. Dust on top of the fridge thick enough so a previous guest had written into it. Bits of food inside and outside the fridge with food not cleaned but just smeared around. This may not be so easily visible on the photos but was very noticeable in person. Dust and hair visible in a gap under the kitchen cabinet. When I drew the curtains there were two large stains visible on it.

Three of the four staff we interacted with were unfriendly and grumpy and we felt we inconvenienced them. For example, when my wife ordered a meat pie the lady behind the counter just turned and walked away. We looked at each other puzzled. A while back this lady came with a paper bag and handed it to my wife without words ‚Äì there was a meat pie in it she had heated up. Now people can have a bad day, but as said, three of the four staff we interacted with were behaving like this.

Considering we paid $300 for one night we are very disappointed. We stayed at backpackers at a fraction of this price which were cleaner, the staff was friendly and bending over backwards to help.

What I write here is a fair description of our experience.
Positive Reviews: We booked this accommodation because it's walking distance to the thermal pools. This cabin was spacious and had everything we needed, including comfortable beds. We did stay at this resort before and have good memories of the previous stay, but this time the cleanliness was unacceptable. Considering we paid $300 for one night we would have expected the kitchen to be clean. The rest of the cabin was clean, including the bath and WC.

Negative Reviews: Only minor but the bunk ladder was a little dodgy haha and the bathroom window didn't have a lock attached to it. (Rm 8)

Negative Reviews: The cleanliness of the room and the price

Review Title: Unfortunately, poor value for spend. OK experience, not likely to return.
Negative Reviews:
Accommodation - Daily service was below average, each day, vacuum was hopeless, more investment required for real equipment to pick up and clean the floors effectively. Investment in better dishwasher needed. Parts of the bathroom walls were not clean, had previous guests hair etc. and no toilet cleaning products. If you're staying in a Motel for longer than 3 days you should have had the bathroom serviced and the bins emptied. We stayed for 6 nights. The cleaners were lovely, but less than 5mins each time for servicing.  When departing, Reception staff seemed to busy to care when they asked how was our stay and I said it was "OK", they didn't care to find out more, nor looked me in the eye, instead said thank you, goodbye.

Pool - Other behaviour went unnoticed by others and it was kind of hard to identify 'pool guards' so would recommend a change in 'tops' for obvious sakes. Unfortunately only one slide was operating which was very disappointing for our son, there were other works going on and 'cautioned taped off' and the deck under the outdoor carpet seemed well overdue for repair as it bounced when you walked along it. New Years Eve the pool closed an hour earlier, however many of us that went there at 8.30pm expecting at least an hour to spa, were disappointed as we arrived and it was closing, not advertised well anywhere and was a waste of our '3 day pass' we purchased.
Positive Reviews:
Accommodation - Friendly, welcoming staff when we checked in. Nice size, bedding was fresh, well made, good size fridge, freezer, nice size bathroom and good shower flow and very thankful for the aircon. 

Pool - The Office staff were excellent every time, friendly, welcoming, clear and happy! The pools were at a lovely temp. The pool lifeguards were OK, I really only saw one of them effectively caution bad behaviour.

Review Title: Would come again in a heartbeat.
Negative Reviews: We had a full kitchen but no pans etc to cook with. One day the service was missed and we didn‚Äôt know why. In-room coffee wasn‚Äôt great. Minor stuff really.
Positive Reviews: The rooms had room service and they dropped off fresh towels every day. The washing machine was useful and a dryer was available in the dryer block. The playground and giant bouncy thing were great.

Negative Reviews:
The Queen sized bed has a really large dip in the middle, made roll together prevalent. 
The staff at the pools were not as engaged as to be expected. On our first day, a child vomited on the stairs to the pool (at water level) and the parents quickly cleaned with paper towels and left. It was really gross then on the last morning two of the children in our traveling group woke with tummy bugs. There was a very large adult on the slides without a wrist band who was grumpy towards our children telling them to hurry and go down the slide. I just didn‚Äôt actively see staff monitoring and roaming as I would have expected.
Positive Reviews: The room service was fantastic, timely and friendly and plenty of stock given (like towels). Having a drying rack in the room etc was really helpful and a good sized fridge/freezer.

Negative Reviews: We didn't have much in the room in the way of kitchen utensils unfortunately. Not sure if the staff knew this or not and we didn't see any room service as such. I would have been happy to vacuum myself but there was nothing in the room.

The pool use was an extra fee on top. I don‚Äôt mind the old hot pools but they felt dirty with slime.

Negative Reviews:
Spider webs up high, and a lot of dust on fridge and microwave shelf. I only see it because I'm quite tall though. Mostly clean, and staff were friendly.
 Was expecting a lake view, but could only see a very tiny piece of the lake, so I guess there is a lake view??.
The kids kept hurting their toes on the lip between the lounge and kitchen which isn't level. So they had to wear shoes inside after a few tears.
Positive Reviews: Friendly staff, good sized rooms, loved being close to the hot pools.

Negative Reviews: I believe people will be happy with this room if they don't have other members staying in other rooms comparing with each other and prices paid. I was disappointed in my room in comparison to other rooms and I didn't think that I had good value for the price I paid. I do think the price and advertising of this room needs to be revised as more dissatisfaction will continue. The shower was a perfect size for families with wee ones but the overall size of the bathroom was ridiculous for a family advertised room, again in comparison to other options that were cheaper with bigger bathrooms. Also advertised is a lake view which is barely visible. Electric blankets which weren't there, not an issue due to heat pump but it is advertised. Also advert says refrigerator so I was expecting a full sized refrigerator when arriving I had to borrow space in another members refrigerator as my room only had a bar fridge. The bin was also on the small size for a family room but bins were close enough to empty. I believe the other rooms were great value for the price but my room was overpriced in comparison, I personally felt that the cheaper rooms next to our one had many better features and the more expensive rooms weren't that much more expensive, if I knew I would have paid the extra for these rooms as they were a great great deal better and not much more darer. And lastly, one staff member was horrible but thankfully considering how kind the rest of the staff were, it is no hassle to overlook this one person.
Positive Reviews:
The atmosphere was nice and relaxing. The heat pump was necessary and a great option and our beds were comfortable. Park for kids is great and communal area is a great place to chat and have coffee. Access to pools is great.
Thank you to all friendly staff.

Negative Reviews: Pillows were to thin. No extra pillows in wardrobe. Cabin parking was too narrow. Only 1 restaurantt nearby, walking distance though which was okay. A bit far from the city centre of Taupo. Price was a bit high for the amenities available.

Review Title: My stay was enjoyable and I hope we come back (preferably when that woman is not there)
Negative Reviews: There was one unfriendly incident with a particular staff member who was quite rude and aggressive toward my family and I during a pre-approved birthday party we had organised in the communal bbq area. She was very hostile and ended up ruining not only the birthday celebrations, but she also dampened the rest of our stay. She pretty much refused to speak nicely and used every excuse under the sun to ‚Äújustify‚Äù her actions, even when she was told to apologise for her rudeness.
Positive Reviews: The communal facilities were clean and spacious. The entire resort grounds were beautiful and well kept. The staff were lovely and the coffee was amazing! Fellow guests were polite and friendly. The pools were like a relaxing bath after a long day. I was tenting and felt incredibly safe overall that I even left my valuables unattended in my little tent during the day and night without issue. The caretaker is an amazing man, extremely polite and understanding, and he deserves a raise!

These were all minor things, and wouldn‚Äôt stop us from staying there again.

It maybe on booking.com but i didn't see the additional charge. I would have paid it anyway as the pools were one of the reasons I booked for the kids.
Positive Reviews: Place is so beautiful. Great location. We had superior family room - it was very comfortable. The pools were in renovation when we stayed and will be amazing when finished. Review Title: we liked our stay, we would have just preferred the unit to be cleaner. that part was quite disappointing
Negative Reviews: the unit we stayed in was quite dirty with cobwebs in every ceiling in every room and big cobwebs behind both of the bedroom blinds. there were also little brown spiders on the walls that I has to get rid of & two cockroaches. I was disappointed in that, as a quick dust or vacuum would clear all that away.  also the pots were not cleaned properly as they still had baked on food from the tenants that used the unit previously.
Positive Reviews: the unit we stayed in was lovely and very comfortable. great location. was wonderful and spacious for the kids to walk and run around the resort.

Review Title: Superb stay for a relaxing retreat for a family with a young child.
Negative Reviews: We missed towel service on one day. Wasn't a major, but more regular towel service would be ideal for a spa resort. We were told we could have gone to reception to swap out the pool towels, so not a major. We also happened to have brought our own towels for the pool which was a great idea. I didn't like the fry pans for cooking eggs/bacon, but hey... that's something that is easily worn out and what they had did the trick. That said, I'm very picky on my fry pans and I'm happy to bring my own and we'll definitely be back next time.
Positive Reviews: This was an amazing retreat to relax as a family of 3, 2 adults and a 4 year old. I was worried about travelling with a young child, but this place made it easy. The one bedroom apartment floor space was huge and we set up a little play area in the living room. The beds and couch were very comfy. The kitchen/fridge was large with ample space to prep breakfasts/lunch/basic dinner. I loved the closets were set up to store suitcases flat so you can open them up like a drawer and access your things without your stuff in the way. Heaps of bathroom drawer storage to keep sink area clutter free, we were able to keep a whole pack of nappies in the bottom drawer for night time. The aesthetic of the gardens and surrounding area was amazing. The closeness to the spa pools, discount on spa pool (yes, you do have to pay for them, but the discount is good and I'd rather pay for them separately than have it added to the room charge daily then you can choose to go or not), but we went multiple times a day for two days, it was amazing. You get a return pass for free re-entry on the same day and the lighting at night on the walk back from the hot pools was excellent. Overall, a relaxing place, great for families and close to everything. Loved the affordable price of the room just after Labour day, which rivalled a lot of other places and we'd much rather return here with how easy it was to keep our little one entertained and fed.

Review Title: Over priced and not up to Top10 holiday park standards.
Negative Reviews:
The kitchen had a tiny frying pan and a couple of saucepans. No large pans at all to go into the oven or to cook on the stove top. There wasn‚Äôt even a paring of chopping knife so we ended up eating out. 
The view from our motel unit was not good and was advertised with a lake or Mountain View but it overlooked a road and the tiniest glimpse of mountain through trees.
Parking was really awkward in our unit (motel number 5) and had to reverse out through a tight windy area around other vehicles which was frustrating.
The light in the bedroom flickered, and the TV had no guide, clunky controls and was poor quality.
There was no artwork or any decoration in the unit, it seemed to be all done on the cheap. The bedroom had no heat pump just an electric heater which was ok but could have been better for the price.
Half the pools were closed off due to maintenance which was known about but the local AC Baths were a much better deals. Considering the closures they should provide guests with free pool access. Pool changes rooms are a joke in my opinion especially in the freezing winter.
Positive Reviews: The staff were very accommodating and friendly.

Negative Reviews: Where do I start? There was black mould on the roller blind and algue growing on the bathroom trap, and a big layer of dust on the carpet edging. The mattress on the queen bed was super uncomfortable for two people (both of them average-sized with 1.7m and 70kg). The mattresses in the bunkroom were foam only, which might be okay for kids but was a painful experience for us adults. It felt like we were sleeping straight on the slates. This room should never be rentable by a group of adults at least not without a warning about the mattress type. The kitchen is poorly equipped and the crockery was dirty. We had to wash everything before we could use it. There were three coat hangers for 4 people. We had to ask twice for tea towels, a dish cloth, towels, and toilet paper of which we were given one roll only. There was no storage space or shelving in the bathroom only a wee stool. You could hear the neighbours' TV or talking through the thin walls. And all that for 250 dollars a night! When I showed reception the photos of the mould and algue (health hazards as I told her) on checkout, I got a sweet smile and apology. Not blaming the young receptionist here, it's not her fault but maybe she should be trained to call her manager in situations like that. This is the first bad review I have left in years for a hotel and the first time I feel let down by the booking.com rating. The only reason we endured this for a second night is because Taupo was booked out over the Ironman weekend.
Positive Reviews: The staff was friendly and that's about it.

Review Title: A smelly shed on a caravan park!
Negative Reviews: This resort was misrepresented. It is a caravan park with some porta cabin rooms. Ours was dirty, pillowcases had yellow stains on it. The staff did not make up the rooms or change the towels which were damp from the night before, despite leaving a note for them to do so. As a resident you have to pay extra to use the spa pools. There is no safe in the room. The fridge is situated 1.5m from your head on the bed so it wakes you up every time it turns on and off. This was not worth $340 for 2 nights. I could have stayed at the Hilton next door for $350......

Review Title: Could have done even a little more to make it cosy.
Negative Reviews: Sparsely decorated.

Negative Reviews:
I booked x1 cabin for my family, then received an e-mail from De Bretts notifying me it was two shared-cabins. That was okay, however upon arrival I was told the cabins were entirely separate, at opposite ends of the holiday-park. This was inconvenient as my children were split into two "groups", our belongings of food etc were shared between two cabins instead of one - causing a great deal of to-and-fro walking in-between each cabin. This caused the kids' bedtimes & breakfasts tricky between two cabins placed far from each other. The smaller cabin had paper-thin walls - we could hear the couple next door snoring amongst other things! 

Both cabins were exceptionally clean as were the bathroom facilities. The smaller cabin didn't have a microwave or sink so I couldn't do the dishes. 

I will return to De Bretts however I will make it clear next time that if we are to have separate cabins that they are in close proximity.

Review Title: Comfortable, but not much else -- Pool Access is extra $$
Negative Reviews:
We didn't like that you have to pay 14$ per person to enter the mineral pool. When we booked, it was indicated that 'most packages' have pool access included, which yes, is vague wording but we figured it would be or if not, that it would be a minimal charge. We can see now that the wording on both Booking and Taupo Debretts website is updated, which helps out future guests, but it still doesn't tell you how much. Totally could have been an oversight on our part, but definitely something that affected our satisfaction with the stay. Especially since the mineral pools are under construction and while the pool that is open is nice, again, it doesn't feel worth the money. 

As for the apartment; it's comfortable, but nothing special, and not what you would expect for the price. Overall, it feels like everything needs a bit of a touch up
